name: label
description: The label of the radio button.

name: disabled
description: Determines if the radio button is disabled.

name: hideLabel
description: Determines if the label should be visually hidden. Note that it will still be accessible to screen readers.

name: id
description: The element ID of the radio button.

name: option
description: The value of the radio button.

name: size
description: The size of the radio button.
